message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and you get 40%. We can adjust later if you want.
I'll start with a slightly more aggressive offer. You can try to negotiate from here.
Let's split it evenly this time. We can both get a decent amount, and we don't have to worry about inflation eroding our share any further.
You're trying to split it evenly, but I think I can do better. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time, but I'm still willing to compromise.
I'm willing to concede a bit more, but I think we can both do better than your last offer.  Let's split it closer to 50/50.
I'm not willing to give up too much ground. I'll stick with my previous offer, but I'm willing to make a slight concession to you. This is my final offer for now.
I'm getting impatient. I'm willing to meet you halfway on your last offer. If we don't agree soon, we'll both lose more with inflation.
